title: Advancing Full-Text Search Lemmatization Techniques with Paradigm Retrieval from OpenCorpora. (arXiv:2305.10848v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: In this paper, we unveil a groundbreaking method to amplify full-text search lemmatization, utilizing the OpenCorpora dataset and a bespoke paradigm retrieval algorithm. Our primary aim is to streamline the extraction of a word's primary form or lemma - a crucial factor in full-text search. Additionally, we propose a compact dictionary storage strategy, significantly boosting the speed and precision of lemma retrieval.

translated_title: 利用OpenCorpora的范式检索推进全文搜索词形还原技术
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种突破性方法，利用OpenCorpora数据集和定制的范式检索算法来增强全文搜索词形还原。我们的主要目标是简化单词的主要形式或词形——这是全文搜索中的关键因素。此外，我们提出了一种紧凑的词典存储策略，大大提高了词形检索的速度和精度。
